# The Beginner's Textbook for Fully Homomorphic Encryption


<br />

| Book Info | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Author | Robin Geelen e.a. |
| Description | Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE) is a cryptographic scheme that enables computations to be performed directly on encrypted data, as if the data were in plaintext. Read this book if you want to learn the math behind it! Found on https://arxiv.org/abs/2503.05136 |
| Notice |  -  |
| Repository | N.A. |
